featured.text: Apples have been grown for thousands of years in Asia and Europe, and 29 to North America by European colonists in the 17th century.

definition.zh_def: 殖民者；在殖民地定居的人。
definition.en_def: A person who settles in a new colony or moves into new country.
definition.example: The colonists established a new community in the wilderness.
